column1: Ilberic Brandybuck was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Ilberic was the second son of Seredic Brandybuck and Hilda Bracegirdle
column2: born in . In  little Ilberic attended Bilbos Farewell Party with his family.
it is Celtic-sounding but it seems to be Germanic. it contains alb "Elves" and ric "rule"
column3: "Giving of Names". Wikipedia:Alberic is a dwarf who appears in Richard Wagners Der Ring des Nibelungen.
